00020 // QWT_VERSION is (major << 16) + (minor << 8) + patch.
00021 
00022 #define QWT_VERSION       0x050200
00023 #define QWT_VERSION_STR   "5.2.0"
00024 
00025 #if defined(Q_WS_WIN)
00026 
00027 #if defined(_MSC_VER) /* MSVC Compiler */
00028 /* template-class specialization 'identifier' is already instantiated */
00029 #pragma warning(disable: 4660)
00030 #endif // _MSC_VER
00031 
00032 #ifdef QWT_DLL
00033 
00034 #if defined(QWT_MAKEDLL)     // create a Qwt DLL library 
00035 #define QWT_EXPORT  __declspec(dllexport)
00036 #define QWT_TEMPLATEDLL
00037 #else                        // use a Qwt DLL library
00038 #define QWT_EXPORT  __declspec(dllimport)
00039 #endif
